hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #2# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #the Tower#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #2# major items.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to #the Deku Tree#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Bombchus (10 pieces)# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Morpha# holds...^ #the Prelude of Light# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Barinade# holds...^ #the Sun's Song# and #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs a #generic grotto#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that scoring 1500 in #horseback archery# grants #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Heavy Block First Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #a Zora Scale#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #Kakariko Village# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the way of the hero.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #3 Deku Scrubs#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the true reward is the friends we made along the way.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the Bolero of Fire#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Wallet#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to the #Fire Medallion#.

ZF (Jabu).text: Twenty-three is number one!^And thirty-one is number two!

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Heart Container#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.
